item.title: Less is more: How ‘chain of draft’ could cut AI costs by 90% while improving performance
item.description: Zoom researchers unveil "chain of draft," which cuts AI token usage by 92%, transforming the economics of language model deployment.

item.title: Google launches free Gemini-powered Data Science Agent on its Colab Python platform
item.description: With Google data science agent, one scientist estimated that their data processing time dropped from 1 week to five minutes.

item.title: Micron launches new memory chips to keep up with AI processing

item.title: 2025 has already brought us the most performant AI ever: What can we do with these supercharged capabilities (and what’s next)?
item.description: From OpenAI's 'Deep Research' to DeepMind's 'AI co-scientist,' next-gen AI is smarter and astoundingly capable.
